text: I've had some time with the Galaxy s8
samsung's new phone and I've already
picked out one of my favorite features
it is the screen the guy CSH screen is
really nice it's a 2k screen which means
it's really sharp but my favorite
feature about the screen is actually how
tall it is it's an 18 and a half by 9
aspect ratio which means it's a little
taller than most smartphones which have
a 16 by 9 aspect ratio and that makes it
really easy to use an app and if you
think about it you go we swipe up and
down to go through content on an app and
having a taller screen gives you more
screen real estate to do that in but you
can see more of an app without really
having a school as much up and down one
way they were able to have such a tall
screen is they were able to remove the
physical home button doesn't mean it's
gone entirely there's actually a home
button that's hidden underneath the
display that's pleasure sensitive to
touch and the fingerprint scanner has
been moving around to the back so you'll
see that there's actually a lot more
screen it makes for a much nicer look
than the iPhone here which as you can
see has a much bigger border here the
top and bottom as well as the sides
actually and the physical home button
here and you know this kind of looks
dated now especially compared to the s8
so out of all the other great features
on the Galaxy s8 it's screen is my
favorite feature it was definitely the
one thing that made me think wow when I
first picked it up
